features.additionalInfo: It's for businesses that want to have the flexibility to have multiple loans within one facility that has an overall limit starting from $500,000.
It has a transparent interest rate linked to the Bank Bill Swap Bid rate (BBSY - published daily in the newspaper).
Choose a rollover period between 1 and 6 months. At the end of each rollover period, your interest rate will update based on the current BBSY.
Set different repayment schedules for each loan within the facility to suit your business cash flow.
Get expert advice from our Global Markets specialists to help you minimise your exposure to market interest rate fluctuations.
The Market Rate Loan facility supports up to 25 participating entities.
You can allow your entities to manage their individual cash flow requirements.
Structure your loan to flexibly manage your exposure to market rate changes.

For example, one of your loan accounts may have a 6 month reset period which lets you lock in a low interest rate, while another may have a 1 month reset period that lets you benefit from interest rates dropping again.
Choose to pay a fixed interest rate, by exploring a range of Interest Rate Risk Management (IRRM) options offered by our Global Markets team.
Our Global Markets specialists can give you expert advice.
Make interest only or principal plus interest repayments based on your business needs, and the type of investment you're making.
Loans can be fully secured, partially secured or unsecured.
Secure your loan with residential property, commercial property or other business assets.
View all your accounts in one place with CommBiz, keeping your banking and administration fast and straightforward.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for finance are subject to the Bank’s eligibility and suitability criteria and normal credit approval process.
Medium to large sized Australian businesses and not-for-profit organisations.
You must use the loan for business purposes only.
You must meet the Bank's lending policies and credit risk requirements.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't been overdrawn or had your account in arrears anytime in the past 3 months.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't been declared bankrupt in the last 5 years.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't had any accounts in collections in the past 6 months.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You have a minimum 30% deposit as well as cash reserves to demonstrate that you can operate the busines for at least the first 3 months.

fees.name: Loan establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

fees.name: Line fee
fees.additionalInfo: Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

fees.name: Other fees apply
fees.additionalInfo: Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

fees.name: Facility fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable fees vary e.g. IRRM charges - please speak with your Relationship Manager for rates and terms to suit your needs.

fees.name: Liquidity fee
fees.additionalInfo: Liquidity Fee - 0.25% p.a. on drawn balances on an individual account. Applicable fees vary e.g. IRRM charges - please speak with your Relationship Manager for rates and terms to suit your needs.

fees.name: Rate reset fee
fees.additionalInfo: Rate reset fee - 0.00% p.a. on drawn balances if rollover period is less than 85 days. Applicable fees vary e.g. IRRM charges - please speak with your Relationship Manager for rates and terms to suit your needs.

fees.name: Rollover fee
fees.additionalInfo: Rollover fee - $150.00 per rollover period. Applicable fees vary e.g. IRRM charges - please speak with your Relationship Manager for rates and terms to suit your needs.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

data.name: Market Rate Loan
data.description: A highly flexible loan with transparent pricing to support your business to grow, and repayment options to meet your cash flow cycle.
